exclusion.criterion: Any other severe physical disease that requires immediate medical assistance
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute hypercapnic decompensation with pH <7.30 in routine BGA
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Circumstances that doesn't allow mask ventilation (e.g. facial deformation)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participation in a clinical trial within the last 4 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 70s on BipAp.
